title: Having The Right Motives | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Having The Right Motives | Joel Osteen
description:
If you want to go far in life, you have to regularly examine your motives. What you do is not as important as why you do it. When your heart and actions line up, God will release His blessings over your life. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
